channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside Barrista Coffee shop, 21st January
item.description:
A large green road sign that is bent and slanted from the wind. More leaning torwards the footpath instead of being straight. If we had more strong wind this could be a real issue of saftey
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finchley Road, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding, 21st January
item.description:
This flooding happens every time it rains no matter how light/heavy the rain. This issue has previously been reported but never been resolved. As a pedestrian you have to stand well back as you would get drenched when traffic goes along this part of the road, particularly as cars are often parked across the road in parking bays.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lion Road, Blendon, Bexleyheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubish not collected on time again, 21st January
item.description:
The rubbish collection has been missed agian, the whole street smells and the smell gets inside the cars parked outside, really disgusting this needs to be sorted asap it is a health hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside The Quarters Swiss Cottage, 21st January
item.description:
The photo won't upload but the uneven pathway slab wabbles outside our building which is very hazzardous. There has been strangers that have tripped over it, and our hotel guests also have had issues with the unsteady slap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finchley Road, South Hampstead, Greater London

item.title: Maryens Grove Bmx Bike track facility, 21st January
item.description:
This young person's facility is neglected moss is growing on bike ramps and there's severe flooding and litter making the track unusable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martens Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large puddle outside 57 Green Lane, 21st January
item.description:
Further to the report ref 8693714, it has rained again today and the huge puddle is back. This happens every time there is rain and, when the weather gets cold, it freezes causing people to slip. Passers by are constantly complaining about it and I am concerned that it is causing damage to the wall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, Greater London

item.title: Pavement glass outside the shop hackney barkers causing leaking into property below, 21st January
item.description:
The pavement outside Hackney Barkers at 70–72 Chatsworth Road E5 0LS is causing water ingress into the basement flat below (Flat A). This has led to serious leaks and mould growth in the bedroom, which is unsafe and affecting the tenant’s health.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 0.5 m2, pot hole 150mm depth, 21st January
item.description:
This pothole has previously been reported on a number of occasions and temporarily filled. The surround of the temporary fill has deteriorated and expanded to create this pothole. It’s in the line is of an old utility trench and the surrounding surface conditions are such that the section of carriageway requires resurfacing, otherwise you will be back again in the near future. The pothole is a potential danger to motorcyclists and damage to vehicle tyres and suspensions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Grove, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
